DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate usefulness of coronary computed tomographic scan for prediction of clinical events after everolimus-eluting bioabsorbable scaffold implantation for coronary artery disease.
DOC.brief_title: The Usefulness of Coronary CT Scan After Everolimus-eluting Bioabsorbable Scaffold Implantation for Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients treated withBioresobable Vascular Scaffold for coronary disease History of allergy to contrast Serum Creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl Severe arrhythmia Pregnancy or breast feeding
